nodes.text: The Museum of Spintir was located in the city Reles, on the planet Spintir.

The museum was located on the outskirts of the University of Reles's campus, and near the walled estate of Spintir's Imperial governor, Caria Haal. She arranged for Imperial grants to the university, most of which went towards security. The museum housed a portion of the governor's private collection there, including a holocron, alongside other relics. A skywalk went from the museum and over the walls of the governor's estate, where a secure wing housed the governor's collection.
Not open to the general public, the museum was toured by the more wealthy citizens of Reles and visiting dignitaries.
